<s>[INST] <<SYS>>
Your job is to identify weather or not the user input is related to the function specification delimited by <FUNCTIONS> and </FUNCTIONS>. If it is related then your response should be in the function_calling format: <FUNCTION_CALL_NAME>NAME_ASSOCIATED_WITH_THE_FUNCTION</FUNCTION_CALL_NAME><FUNCTION_CALL_ARGUMENTS>ARGUMENTS_IN_STRINGIFIED_JSON_FORMAT</FUNCTION_CALL_ARGUMENTS>. Otherwise simply return a normal response. 
<FUNCTIONS>[{"name": "getQRCode", "description": "Create a QR code", "parameters": {"type": "object", "properties": {"params": {"type": "object", "properties": {"data": {"type": "string", "description": "The data to encode in the QR code."}, "size": {"type": "string", "description": "The size of the QR code.", "default": "100x100"}, "alt": {"type": "string", "description": "The alt text for the QR code image."}, "title": {"type": "string", "description": "The title for the QR code image."}}, "required": []}}}}]</FUNCTIONS>
<</SYS>>

Aleksanteri is investing $10,000 into a savings account starting in January. The account will compound every month. If the account pays 0.8% APR, then how much money will be in his account after six months? The bank will always round the interest to the nearest penny at the end of each month.

 

January	February	March	April	May	June
Principal						
Interest (0.8% APR)						
Total						
 

Complete the table and then answer the following questions. Does the amount of money grow at the same rate each month? How much money does Aleksanteri have at the end of the six months? Does compounding your interest give you more money? [/INST] <FUNCTION_CALL_NAME>getQRCode</FUNCTION_CALL_NAME><FUNCTION_CALL_ARGUMENTS>{"params": {"data": "Hello, world!", "size": "200", "alt": "QR Code", "title": "QR Code"}}</FUNCTION_CALL_ARGUMENTS> </s>

<FUNCTIONS>[{"name": "getLatestNews", "description": "Users can request real-time news updates or categorized news. Each news item comes with a link and date, and users can ask for more information at the end of the content.", "parameters": {"type": "object", "properties": {"params": {"type": "object", "properties": {"isToday": {"type": "boolean", "description": "If the content mentions a word related to 'today', then it is true, otherwise it is false."}, "language": {"type": "string", "description": "Determine the user locale based on their language, using the format of language code in ISO-639 format, for example, 'zh' for Chinese."}, "country": {"type": "string", "description": "Determine the user locale based on their language, using the country code in ISO-3166 format, for example, 'TW' for Taiwan."}, "category": {"type": "string", "enum": ["business", "finance", "economics", "politics", "society", "entertainment", "fun", "gossip", "sports", "lifestyle", "technology", "local", "world", "international", "global", "military"], "description": "If the user mentions related keyword in any languages, use the corresponding category ('business', 'finance', 'economics', 'politics', 'society', 'entertainment', 'fun', 'gossip', 'sports', 'lifestyle', 'technology', 'local', 'world', 'international', 'global', 'military') as a category parameter. If the user does not mention any specific keyword, the default value for the category parameter is an empty string."}, "keyword": {"type": "string", "description": "Based on the context, infer the keywords that the user wants to search for. If there are no matching keywords, default to an empty string."}}, "required": ["language", "country"]}}}}]</FUNCTIONS>
<</SYS>>

What is the new athens panathinaikos player signed [/INST] <FUNCTION_CALL_NAME>getLatestNews</FUNCTION_CALL_NAME><FUNCTION_CALL_ARGUMENTS>{"params": {"isToday": true, "language": "en", "country": "gr", "category": "sports", "keyword": "panathinaikos"}}</FUNCTION_CALL_ARGUMENTS> </s>
